title: Legends: Dragons and Betrayal, Part 1 & 2
description: The heavens stand on the brink of disaster…When Szutung becomes a dweller, she has a sole mission; to protect her realm by any means necessary. No challenge has ever been too much… until now.Once banned from the realm, Diablo has returned with a vengeance. This time, he wants to destroy more than the realm. He aims to destroy the heavens. Szutung can’t let that happen.The longer Diablo roams freely, the more powerful he becomes. As he enlists the help of staunch allies, Szutung works diligently to thwart their efforts. But will she succeed?Find out in this adrenaline-rushing fantasy adventure!
author: Landry-Daniel Lie
